styles.name: Modern Minimal
styles.description: 简洁优雅的现代设计风格，注重空白space和细节
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a modern, minimal UI design with clean lines, subtle shadows, and elegant typography. Use plenty of whitespace and a professional color palette with blue accents.

styles.name: Neobrutalism
styles.description: 大胆的新残酷主义设计风格，强调对比和视觉冲击
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a bold neobrutalist UI design with thick black borders, high contrast colors, geometric shapes, and monospace fonts. Use bright yellow and red accents.

styles.name: Glassmorphism
styles.description: 玻璃质感的现代设计风格，使用模糊背景和透明效果
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a glassmorphism UI design with frosted glass effects, backdrop blur, subtle transparency, and soft borders. Use gradient backgrounds and glass-like elements.

styles.name: Windows 98
styles.description: 经典的Windows 98系统界面风格，带有立体边框和系统图标
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a Windows 98 style UI with 3D inset/outset borders, system gray backgrounds, pixel fonts, and classic window elements like title bars and system buttons.

styles.name: Metro/Fluent Design
styles.description: 微软现代设计语言，结合磁贴布局和Fluent Design的透明效果
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a Microsoft Fluent Design UI with Live Tiles, Acrylic materials, depth effects, and the signature Microsoft blue color palette. Include blur and transparency effects.

styles.name: Flat Design
styles.description: 纯扁平化设计风格，无阴影无渐变，强调简洁和功能性
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a pure flat design UI with no shadows, gradients, or 3D effects. Use solid colors, simple icons, clear typography, and clean geometric shapes.

styles.name: Neumorphism
styles.description: 新拟物化设计风格，通过柔和阴影创造立体浮雕效果
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a neumorphism UI with soft shadows and embossed effects. Use light gray backgrounds with subtle gradients and rounded corners. Elements should appear to emerge from or sink into the surface.

styles.name: Dark Mode
styles.description: 现代深色主题设计，提供舒适的夜间使用体验
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a dark theme UI with dark backgrounds and light text. Use high contrast colors and subtle glow effects. The design should be modern and comfortable for extended use.

styles.name: Cyberpunk
styles.description: 霓虹灯、科技感的赛博朋克风格，采用明亮的霓虹配色和深色背景。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a cyberpunk UI with neon glow effects, dark backgrounds, and futuristic typography. Use vibrant magenta and cyan accents against deep black surfaces.

styles.name: Retro Wave
styles.description: 怀旧80年代复古波浪风格，使用渐变网格和网格日落元素。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a retro wave UI with vibrant gradients, grid backgrounds, and vaporwave aesthetics. Combine neon pink, orange, and cyan on deep purple backgrounds.

styles.name: Minimalist Japanese
styles.description: 日式极简风格，以自然配色、留白和简约排版为特色。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a minimalist Japanese UI with generous whitespace, neutral colors, and subtle accents. Use clean typography and soft shadows to emulate zen aesthetics.

styles.name: Scandinavian
styles.description: 北欧风格，使用柔和色调、自然材料质感和简洁线条。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a Scandinavian UI with soft neutral colors, clean lines, and cozy accents. Emphasize functionality and natural materials.

styles.name: Industrial
styles.description: 工业设计风格，使用粗犷材质、深色调和醒目的橙色点缀。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create an industrial UI with dark metallic textures, bold orange accents, and rugged typography. Combine steel grays with bright orange highlights.

styles.name: Watercolor
styles.description: 柔和水彩画效果，渐变色块与纸张肌理。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a watercolor UI with soft gradient washes, paper textures, and gentle brush strokes. Use pastel blues, pinks, and yellows on light backgrounds.

styles.name: Sketch / Hand-drawn
styles.description: 手绘素描风格，模拟铅笔线条与涂鸦效果。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a hand-drawn sketch UI with pencil lines, doodle icons, and notebook textures. Keep a playful aesthetic with casual typography.

styles.name: Pixel Art
styles.description: 像素艺术风格，使用8-bit像素图形和块状配色。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a pixel art UI with 8-bit graphics, blocky fonts, and vibrant contrasting colors. Use chunky borders and limited palettes.

styles.name: Grunge
styles.description: 粗糙纹理和破旧效果的垃圾摇滚风格。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a grunge UI with ripped paper textures, splatter overlays, and distressed typography. Combine dark greys with blood-red accents.

styles.name: Vintage
styles.description: 复古旧报纸与柔和棕色调的经典风格。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a vintage UI with sepia tones, serif typography, and decorative borders. Emulate old newspaper aesthetics with subtle paper textures.

styles.name: Medical / Clinical
styles.description: 医疗临床风格，清爽蓝绿配色与模块化信息卡片。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a medical UI with teal primary colors, clear iconography, and card layouts. Ensure high accessibility and a sense of trust.

styles.name: Financial / Banking
styles.description: 金融银行风格，深蓝与金色配色，强调数据可视化。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a financial dashboard UI with navy blue tones, gold accents, and sophisticated typography. Include clear charts and data widgets.

styles.name: Gaming
styles.description: 游戏界面风格，炫酷紫色渐变与动态元素。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a gaming UI with vibrant purple gradients, glowing buttons, and pixel-inspired fonts. Add dynamic hover interactions.

styles.name: E-commerce Pro
styles.description: 高级电商风格，简洁白色基底与黑色文字，强调产品展示。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create a premium e-commerce UI with bold product imagery, minimal text, and clear purchase calls-to-action. Use a black and white palette with red accents.

styles.name: Education Platform
styles.description: 教育平台风格，明亮蓝色与友好卡片设计。
styles.author: Design Team
styles.prompt: Create an education platform UI with light blue tones, friendly icons, and card-based course listings. Encourage exploration and learning.
